title: Management of stat. holidays and premiums for stat. holidays
content: In preparation for the upcoming stat. holiday, the Emprez team suggests the following tutorials simplify your task:Understand how stat. holidays are calculated: Method of calculating stat. holidaysDifferent ways to add a statutory holiday to the schedule:Add a holiday to the schedule individually:Add the stat. holiday to the scheduleAdd the stat. holiday in the timesheet sectionORAdd one or more stat. holidays in batchIf the payroll system is not configured to export stat. holiday, the "Stat. Holiday" choice will not appear in the list.Emprez's advice:To save time, list the stat. holidays for the current year and add them in batches to your employees.If your employees no longer work for you after doing this -Â You will need to remove any scheduled hours after your employee's departure date.If you are hiring staff after adding the holidays in batch you can add the upcoming holidays in batch to them in the same way by simply selecting the name of the new employee.Your employees work on a public holiday:Add a statutory holiday to a shift (in the case of adding a cumulative premium)Add a cumulative stat. holiday premiumUseful link: article on CNESST labour standards by clicking here.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
